TopicTitle: KERBALTUNES - songs made of KSP sounds!

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I decided to do something different recently: namely, to create a song using exclusively sounds used in KSP.

So, this is it.

Percussion is mostly decoupler noises and the clicks that you get when placing parts in the VAB, with some explosions in there as well. The background noise is rocket engines. The melody is created with that one song that's in the "Sounds" folder in the Game Data section, though it's not actually used in the game; there's some of the main KSP melody thrown in at the end.

I'm going to make more of these... they just take a lot of time and effort, and I'm currently also working on songs for that one KSP plugin, so it might be awhile before the next one comes out.

Sorry that the thing is so quiet, by the way. I thought it was too loud when I began the final edit, so I turned it down... apparently a bit too much

Enjoy, and let me know what you think!

-Upsilon
I just love these little projects you do in between the KSP planets songs. This is really good, and extremely unique!
Awesome! I could totally have this as the VAB/SPH music.

Awesome! I could totally have this as the VAB/SPH music.

Yes. Just, yes.
In addition to VAB music I also have fond memories of old SimCity games from the sheer retro-ness of this tune!
The base music is actually it's own music in the game files, editor loop. Presumably was going to be music in the editor.
Dammit, you beat me to it! Oh well.....
